summary: THE REAR DIFFERENTIAL IS LEAKING FLUID.  ON FEBRUARY 11, 2017 THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN IN FOR ROUTINE SERVICE AND INSPECTED FOR A CLUNKING SOUND THAT OCCURS SPORADICALLY UPON BRAKING.  THE FEELING CAN BEST BE DESCRIBED AS IF THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN BUMPED FROM BEHIND.   THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT WAS NOT ABLE TO DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  ON MAY 5, 2017 THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN IN FOR ROUTINE MAINTENANCE AND RETAINED BY THE TOYOTA DEALER DUE TO A LEAKING REAR DIFFERENTIAL THAT WAS DESCRIBED AS A SERIOUS SAFETY DEFECT.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED AS OF JUNE 24, 2017.
